features: 2023 Upgraded Clothes Steamer: HULMAY Handheld Steamer for Clothes suitable for all fabrics with a fast 10-second heat-up and 20 minutes of continuous steam. Compact and lightweight, This portable garment steamer for clothes will be your most worry free travel companion.

Dual Steaming & Ironing Convenience:This Garment Steamer and Iron for Clothes comes with 80ml refillable water tank, paired with a rotatable head for both horizontal and vertical steaming. you can dry and iron your clothes immediately, allowing you to handle urgent situations calmly

Simple, One-Button Wrinkle Removal: Our steamer iron for clothes have advanced heating element and durable metal steel head that ensure exceptional performance and reliability. With single press on one button, you can have wrinkle free clothes

Optimal Power Requirements: This steamer for clothes is Ideal for use in countries like the US, Canada, and Japan. Note: Not suitable for 220-240V outlets to prevent damage, completely worry free and versatile model of garment steamer and iron for clothes

Included Accessories: You will get 1*Clothes Steamer, 1*Water Tank, 1*Base, 1*User Manual, 1*Measuring Cup, and 1*Heat-Resistant Glove. Plus, enjoy the confidence of a 365-day money-back warranty for this portable garment steamer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very handy to use
reviews.reviewText: Small size. Light weight and provides good performance. It’s value for the price.This steam iron is really very cool and very handy to use.Works really great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to carry
reviews.reviewText: This steamer is fast, effective, and easy to use. It heats up in less than a minute and has a nice plate to rest it while it cools. it is reasonably compact making it travel-ready.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my destination wedding. It was so handy. It made my dress perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just the ticket
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for steaming out wrinkles in clothes that were either left in the dryer or were hung dry. For more stubborn wrinkles it works quite well as an iron.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Portable and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for portable steamer and then I found this . It is very easy to use and withoutgoibg thru instructions , we can use it smoothly. Steamer is very well and work on all types of cloths. Best thing is, its portable so that i can take it with me on my trips.Good in overall quality and built.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Steamer doesn't work.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this steamer for business trip to steam my suit before an important meeting. When I got to my hotel, I took out the steamer, and was ready to steamer my suit, I was shocked that the steamer didn't work. The power was on, but it didn't produce any steam. I had to use the steam setting on the hotel iron and try to create enough busts of steam to look presentable. I lugged the brand new, but useless steamer back home in my suitcase. So far I haven't been able to locate the original box to return it in. But I'm still looking for it. The steamer us junk. I read a few other bad reviews for this steamer, but since there was a larger number of positive reviews, I took the chance. Don't make the same mistake.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This portable steamer is excellent! Perfect for my business travel. Allows me to pack different and still able to look crisp, clean and professional. One of the best products I’ve ever purchased!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars good but need to be careful
reviews.reviewText: I like the design. easy to use. However the gloves is too thin even u wear it u still can get hurt by the steam. so be careful

This steamer is fantastic! It emits a TON of steam and works very well on wrinkles. I used it on 100% cotton dress shirt, cotton/polyester blend trousers and a polyester women's suit jacket - all were wrinkle-free before they were packed, but they were squeezed into packing cubes and stuffed into a tight suitcase, so they had the usual travel wrinkles pretty badly. This steamer worked on everything! Note that this steamer won't work on higher voltage (e.g., in Europe) even with a voltage adapter (I blew the fuse on my voltage adapter....so don't do that....). It is small for travel and is like travelling with a hair dryer or a big hair waver/straightener. Will definitely be packing it for all my North American trips instead of relying on a hotel iron.
